  1. ↑ Aldur's Watchtower can only be fully equipped by a druid.
  2. ↑ 2.0 2.1 Bul-Kathos' Children and Immortal King can only be fully equipped by a barbarian.
  3. ↑ Griswold's Legacy can only be fully equipped by a paladin.
  4. ↑ 4.0 4.1 Isenhart's Armory and Sazabi's Grand Tribute are the only two sets that can be fully equipped by a mercenary.
  5. ↑ M'avina's Battle Hymn can only be fully equipped by an amazon.
  6. ↑ Natalya's Odium can only be fully equipped by an assassin.
  7. ↑ Tal Rasha's Wrappings can only be fully equipped by a sorceress.
  8. ↑ Trang-Oul's Avatar can only be fully equipped by a necromancer.
